Author: linux-security@amazon.com
Title: Amazon Linux 2023 - Kernel Livepatch - ALAS2023LIVEPATCH-2023-003: important priority package update for kernel-livepatch-6.1.15-28.43
Description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2023 - Kernel Livepatch that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2023-28466:
	do_tls_getsockopt in net/tls/tls_main.c in the Linux kernel through 6.2.6 lacks a lock_sock call, leading to a race condition (with a resultant use-after-free or NULL pointer dereference).

CVE-2023-1611:

CVE-2023-1077:
	kernel: Type confusion in pick_next_rt_entity(), which can result in memory corruption.
